response.original_title: Bob Luman at Town Hall Party
response.overview: Here are priceless performances filmed during the Town Hall Party show, broadcast every Saturday night in the Compton suburb of Los Angeles. Bob performs on shows taped on Sept. 21st & 27th, 1958, as well as Oct. 4th & 25th 1958. Here, we see why Luman was one of rock 'n roll's all-time great performers as he sings Svengali, I Walk the Line, Blue Suede Shoes, Ready Teddy, Shake, Rattle & Roll, Rockin' Robin, Early in the Morning, Folsom Prison Blues, Precious, Oh Lonesome Me, Itchy Twitchy Feeling, Love Makes the World Go Round, Stagger Lee, A Lover's Question, I Got a Woman and My Baby Walks All Over Me.
response.title: Bob Luman at Town Hall Party
